document.full_text: australia said on wednesday it was suspending cattle exports to indonesia after an outcry over the inhumane treatment of cattle in its neighbor, as animal rights groups called for an outright ban on trade to other countries.
document.title: australia suspends cattle exports to indonesia
lines_and_colors: australia said on wednesday it was suspending cattle exports to indonesia after an outcry over the inhumane treatment of cattle in its neighbor, as animal rights groups called for an outright ban on trade to other countries.
